text:
The Python 3.5 now has the most recent versions. This uncovered a buglet in space_net.py for python 3 and numpy < 1.9 ... @dohmatob maybe you just want to glance a the fix?

The root issue is that:

``` python
import numpy as np

array = np.arange(10)
array[range(3)]
```

doesn't work in numpy < 1.9 (array index can not be an iterator). It does the right thing in numpy >= 1.9.
title: [MRG+1] Add python3.5 to Travis
clean_text: the python 35 recent version thi uncov buglet spacenetpi python 3 numpi 19 dohmatob mayb want glanc fix the root issu doesnt work numpi 19 array index iter It right thing numpi

text:
FIX numpy 1.8 unsupported interator index

With Python 3, range is an iterator and numpy arrays can not use
iterator as index in numpy 1.8.
